items.content_html: Flight Board App is a responsive web application that simulates a flight status board, displaying real-time flight information, similar to classic airport departure screens. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite, the app is designed to be fast, lightweight, and adaptable across different screen sizes.
items.title: rambedade/flight-board: Flight  Board App is a responsive web application that simulates a flight status board, displaying real-time flight information, similar to classic airport departure screens. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite, the app is designed to be fast, lightweight, and adaptable across different screen sizes.

items.content_html: PixelPeek is a lightweight and powerful Chrome extension that allows you to inspect the pixel dimensions of various elements on any webpage. Whether you're a web developer, designer, or simply curious, PixelPeek provides a quick and intuitive way to get real-time pixel sizes of images, videos, icons, buttons, and more.
